description: Demolition of canopy at rear and refurbishment of building to provide 23 000sqm of floorspace which is simular to the existing amount of floorspace. Proposal includes a 5th floor extension (2 200sqm) and elevational changes. Vehicle access would be fron Moreland Street and Hall Street. Proposed use would be for offices or for other Buisness Use purposes which include light industrial and High Tech uses. Approximatley 70 parking spaces are indicated. PROPOSED PLANS:89343/AD(2)01 02 03 AP/01 02 03A 04A 06A 09B 10A 11A 13 14 15 16 AD(0)26 27. THIS IS A DUPLICATE APPLICATION SEE 90/0020.
decision_conditions: APPLICATION HAS BEEN WITHDRAWN BECAUSE DUPLICATE APPLICATION WAS APPROVED 20.06.90.
